name: UIDatePickerStyle
desc: Styles that determine the appearance of a date picker.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A style indicating that the system picks the concrete style based on the current platform and date picker mode.

items.name: case compact
items.desc: A style indicating that the date picker displays as a label that when tapped displays a calendar-style editor.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: A style indicating that the date pickers displays as an inline, editable field.

items.name: case wheels
items.desc: A style indicating that the date picker displays as a wheel picker.
